Name: Amanda's Magic Book 6: Aladdin's Magic Lamp
About the game: Step through the pages of a magical book and follow Amanda and Charlie on their journey into a world of genies' lamps, bustling bazaars, and cunning sorcerers in this Match-3 adventure unlike anything you've seen before! You'll discover secrets and meet colorful characters as you face off against a powerful dark sorcerer and save the kingdom! - Play through five chapters with over 60 Match3 levels! - Unlock powerful upgrades and bonuses while you play! - Follow the classic story with all-new twists and turns!
